definition: قبس qabasa i (qabs) to derive, acquire, loan, borrow, adopt, take over (من هـ s.th. from) VIII to take, or seek to take, fire (من from, also نارا من); to acquire or seek to acquire knowledge (من from, also علما من); to learn (هـ s.th.); to loan, borrow, adopt, take over (من or هـ عن s.th. from) قبس qabas firebrand; live coal
